ItemIngredient0.Description: A saturated wax ester harvested from the fathomless abyss.
ItemIngredient0.Description_de: Ein gesättigter Wachsester, der in unermesslichen Tiefen gewonnen wurde.
ItemIngredient0.Description_en: A saturated wax ester harvested from the fathomless abyss.
ItemIngredient0.Description_fr: Une sorte de cire très ancienne en provenance des fonds marins.
ItemIngredient0.Description_ja: 湖底で眠っていた古代の蝋
ItemIngredient0.Name: Marine Wax Ester

ItemIngredient1.Description: A stout candle made from sheep fat.
ItemIngredient1.Description_en: A stout candle made from sheep fat.
ItemIngredient1.Description_fr: Une chandelle en graisse de mouton solidifiée.
ItemIngredient1.Description_ja: 羊脂を固めたロウソク
ItemIngredient1.Name: Tallow Candle

ItemIngredient2.Description: A stout candle made from hardened beeswax.
ItemIngredient2.Description_en: A stout candle made from hardened beeswax.
ItemIngredient2.Description_fr: Une chandelle en cire d'abeille solidifiée.
ItemIngredient2.Description_ja: 蜜蝋を固めたロウソク
ItemIngredient2.Name: Beeswax Candle

ItemIngredient8.Description: A large crystalline manifestation of aetheric water energy.
ItemIngredient8.Description_en: A large crystalline manifestation of aetheric water energy.
ItemIngredient8.Name: Water Cluster
ItemIngredient8.Name_ja: ウォータークラスター
ItemIngredient8.Singular_ja: ウォータークラスター

ItemIngredient9.Description: A large crystalline manifestation of aetheric lightning energy.
ItemIngredient9.Description_en: A large crystalline manifestation of aetheric lightning energy.
ItemIngredient9.Description_fr: Un agrégat de cristaux de foudre.
ItemIngredient9.Name: Lightning Cluster
ItemIngredient9.Name_ja: ライトニングクラスター
ItemIngredient9.Singular_ja: ライトニングクラスター

ItemSoulCrystal.Description: Upon the back of this crystal plaque are engraved the myriad creations of alchemists from eras past.
ItemSoulCrystal.Description_de: Wenn du diesen Handwerker-Kristall anlegst, wirst du als Alchemist zum Spezialisten.
ItemSoulCrystal.Description_en: Upon the back of this crystal plaque are engraved the myriad creations of alchemists from eras past.
ItemSoulCrystal.Description_fr: Ce joyau renferme les souvenirs et les secrets des alchimistes des temps passés.
ItemSoulCrystal.Description_ja: 錬金術師のマイスターとして認められた証
ItemSoulCrystal.Name: Soul of the Alchemist
ItemSoulCrystal.Name_ja: マイスターの証:錬金術師
ItemSoulCrystal.Singular_ja: マイスターの証:錬金術師

ItemResult.Description: Whatever you enshrine with these many, many candles is your business.
ItemResult.Description_de: Eine Unmenge an Kerzen, die sich gut für die Errichtung eines Schreins eignen würden.
ItemResult.Description_en: Whatever you enshrine with these many, many candles is your business.
ItemResult.Description_fr: Un ensemble de bougies de tailles et de formes diverses.
ItemResult.Description_ja: いろいろな大きさの蝋燭のセット
ItemResult.Name: Assorted Candles

Item.Description: This esoteric tome─the sixth in an equally esoteric series─contains advanced alchemy recipes that can only be learned by esoterically skilled alchemists.
Item.Description_de: Dieser kostbare Foliant enthält Rezepte, die nur von meisterlichen Alchemisten (Stufe 70) entziffert werden können.
Item.Description_en: This esoteric tome─the sixth in an equally esoteric series─contains advanced alchemy recipes that can only be learned by esoterically skilled alchemists.
Item.Description_fr:
Des recettes occultes réservées aux plus grands ouvriers.

Utilisable à partir du niveau 70 dans la discipline.
Item.Description_ja:
熟練錬金術師向け秘伝レシピ帳

使用条件 : 錬金術師 Lv70～
Item.Name: Master Alchemist VI
